p: Fifty C.B-17 severe combined immunodeficient (SCID) mice (females, 25–30 g) were obtained and kept at the animal facilities of the Gonçalo Moniz Institute-FIOCRUZ (Salvador, Bahia, Brazil). The animals were housed in cages with free access to food and water. All animals were subjected to a 12:12 h light–dark cycle (lights on at 6:00 a.m.). The animal ethics committee of the Gonçalo Moniz Institute-FIOCRUZ approved the experimental protocol used (number #06/2015).
